name: Fnaf 3 online
description:
Fnaf 3 is a point and click survival horror game created by Scott Cawthon in 2015.

THIS IS THE FULL GAME, ALL SOUNDS AND IMAGES ARE CREDIT TO SCOTT CAWTHON!!! p.s. there is no custom night, but ther is a 6th night. NOTE: the html download doesn't work on IOS, only the version on this website.
